html:
8.15.18  2:20 pm   I really admire the content you create, and how you create that content. Do you really need to go through all that just to make something that people will like?

     i will try not making it and see if they like it then

8.15.18  2:08 pm   What is the great ocean with the courage and insight to imagine a billion nucleotides? 

     your mind

8.15.18  1:58 pm   do you have any advice for going back to school?

     first you must find where the school is located

8.15.18  1:50 pm   Are you my mom?

     step mom

8.15.18  12:50 pm   should i consider giving my "friend" what he deserves over a game of mario party

     what does he deserve

8.15.18  12:17 pm   how to stop feeling carsick

     respect the physical journey you are taking

8.15.18  12:12 pm   How come "Bob Marley" isn't on Spotify?

     it probably should be

     I love that one! Do you really hate that first verse so much?

     sure, and there are other things about it that i don't like, and like

8.15.18  12:06 pm   What is the 0.01% that hand sanitizer doesn't clean

     ghosts and ghouls

8.15.18  11:31 am   how do you get out of bed in the morning?

     there must be 100 ways

8.15.18  11:27 am   Have you read Alice's Adventures in Wonderland?

     i think i saw a movie of it

8.15.18  11:06 am   How can you motivate someone?

     explain their own motivation to them

8.15.18  11:06 am   I love making art but I get scared to make a thing because I'm scared I'll do it badly. How do you work around this fear

     all the art you love is bad

8.15.18  10:46 am   How can I fly?

     you will have to build some kind of flying machine or if you are on a tight schedule you could buy tickets to someone else's

8.15.18  10:17 am   how can i get a sexy voice like yours

     drink plenty of water, don't ever clear your throat, don't whisper, sing gentle slow long tones throughout the day, but more important than any of that is have fun

8.15.18  8:14 am   why im not smart?

     because you are a liar

8.15.18  7:40 am   On a scale of 1 to 10, how likely are you to recommend life to your family and friends?

     0, not necessary they already bought it

8.15.18  7:36 am   eggs

     that's true

8.15.18  7:22 am   Do you have any tips on writing chord progressions?

     it's all based on how the song goes. first you must figure out how the song goes

8.15.18  7:09 am   Who'd win in a fight, you or Shrek?

     if i could predict the winners of fights before they happen, i would be spending a lot more time in the casino and less time in the boxing ring

8.15.18  6:08 am   Why don't you put the questions link on the first menu because it's a more widely used page 

     because the layout of this site is not based on traffic

8.15.18  6:07 am   Please help i ate a spicy pizza and it's too spicy i'm literally dying what do i do please help

     eat a marshmallow, if that doesn't work eat a second marshmallow

8.15.18  4:48 am   How to avoid depression?

     panic

8.15.18  4:20 am   Bill, how do I become more attractive so that people will notice me? I currently feel like a blob.

     attractiveness is not necessarily the best ticket to noticeability. the best strategy is to turn up the amplitude on your actual character

8.15.18  4:09 am   This sentence is false

     fair enough

8.15.18  2:24 am   What's your opinion on Chihauhaus?

     they are small

      Do you laugh at their name?

     no but i laugh at their size

      Do you think that they're all homophobic? 

     no

8.15.18  1:08 am   How do you feel about hats in general?

     seems like there aren't any new kinds. every hat is some kind of throw back to an old kind of hat. where are the new hats, that's what i say

8.15.18  12:50 am   if we reinvented the wheel would that mean we also have to reinvent the tricycle

     maybe just a slight re-design, depending on how different the new wheel is

8.15.18  12:08 am   what kind of phone do you have?

     banana

8.14.18  11:45 pm   Is procrastination really bad?

     i think it's misunderstood

      It has "Pro" in it. Pro is good. Con is bad.

     not always

8.14.18  11:40 pm   what the hell?? who let everything cost so much?

     the seller and the buyer

     starting to think that freedom should be free but there are suckers all over the place who have screwed the rest of us

     have you considered screwing them back

8.14.18  11:08 pm   i can guess what a note is out of context, within one half-step of accuracy. is this normal

     actually yes

      or do i maybe have secret perfect pitch powers that i haven't trained yet

     you have the secret to getting it at least better than the majority of people who brag about having it

8.14.18  10:57 pm   Do you have sexy pants?

     all pants are sexy, as soon as someone puts them on

8.14.18  10:35 pm   why isn't "a brief history of spain (and portugal)" on youtube? (unless it is, and I just couldn't find it)

     youtube removed it and placed a content strike against my channel, without warning, 3 years after the video was posted

8.14.18  10:28 pm   What do you think about people who say that genre X isn't "real music"?

     they might not be real people

8.14.18  9:32 pm   any tips for documenting my journey and keeping it organized?

     write things put dates on them and save them somewhere

8.14.18  9:28 pm   what were the dankest memes of ancient greece?

     the pythagorean theorem, the illiad, the olympics

8.14.18  8:53 pm   Why do you have song only versions of your song/video multi-media creations but not video only versions?

     those items revolve around the sound

8.14.18  8:09 pm   What's some cool poetry?

     the terms and conditions you implicitly agreed to without even knowing

8.14.18  7:26 pm   How avoid the procrastination?

     remember you can always procrastinate later

8.14.18  6:11 pm   what is your preferred mode of transportation?

     the self-riding horse

8.14.18  5:51 pm   should i get creative

     sure

8.14.18  5:44 pm   whats the funniest joke

     seriousness

8.14.18  4:56 pm   Thoughts on the spread of misinformation in science and politics?

     they are supposed to put a disclaimer on the bottom saying it's misinformation, in at least a 19 point font

8.14.18  4:55 pm   how to know if ideas are worth it

     worth what

8.14.18  3:48 pm   Does the day really go on?

     yes, and off

8.14.18  3:18 pm   Hey Bill, you've drastically changed my life through your answers on this page and your very high quality content. You got me out of a deadly hole of nonstop procrastination. Did you ever struggle with procrastination or have you always pushed yourself to do work?

     the key is to figure out what it is your delaying specifically. and you usually find out you don't know. so i've found that procrastination is actually just uncertainty and confusion. and once you ask the right questions the door will fly off the hinges

8.14.18  2:05 pm   do you believe in zodiac signs

     my zodiac is not broken into signs, it is a continuous spectrum gradually changing as it goes around

8.14.18  2:04 pm   should i follow buddhism?

     sure. or make your own thing and maybe someone will follow that

8.14.18  1:55 pm   When you were on your daily vine schedule, did you ever make more than one a day to free up time for other projects? 

     i tried but it absolutely never worked. i finally figured out the secret was to just start the damn japan thing anyway, skip the vine (or at least pretend to) until 2 hours before the end of the day and then scramble the vine together at the last minute. starting the vines early, or in advance, never got me ahead of the schedule because they always take longer if they're not actually due. there's simply no psychological way around that

8.14.18  1:06 pm   what is the best way to deal with harsh and hurtful criticism?

     go on a carnival cruise
